CustomField.description: Counts the number of values selected in Service Types multi-select. If the options in Service Types is changed, this formula has to be changed too.
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Auto'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'CannonClean'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'CannonControl'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'CannonFresh'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Disposal'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Ecolo'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Life'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Pest'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Pest Special'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Other'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Soap'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Life'),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Service_Types__c,'Vending'),1,0)
CustomField.label: Service Types Count
